direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods process and return an option value, with getOptionObject handling exceptions internally.
Both methods retrieve option values, though getOptionObject handles type conversion and exceptions.
Both methods access and process option-related data, though getOptionProperties focuses on properties.
Both methods check the state of options, though hasOption only checks existence.

enhanced_by.reason: Adding options is necessary to set up the state for getOptionObject to retrieve them.
getParsedOptionValue is invoked within getOptionObject to handle type conversion.
The value retrieved by getOptionObject can be verified using getOptionValue for basic string comparison.
